name: ahavatfit
description: A fitness application for Muslim women.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/images && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/index.js --minify && cp index.html index.css cookbook.json workouts.json manifest.json sw.js dist/ && cp images/*.png dist/images/
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
